name: Tabz<3
greetingText: I really like your smile btw :)
wishText:
To the one who lights up my world, Every moment with you feels like a dream come true. Your smile is my sunshine, and your love is my greatest treasure. I wish for you endless joy, boundless love, and all the happiness your heart can hold. May every day bring you closer to your dreams, and may you always know how deeply you are cherished.
 BY YOUR MAN
